abstract: AMR Corporation‘s American Airlines is in early talks to raise cash from its credit card partner, Citigroup, by selling it frequent-flier miles, the Financial Times reported, citing people familiar with the matter. In a report on its Web site, the newspaper said the two companies were in discussion over an arrangement in which American Airlines would sell Citi a block of frequent-flier miles in advance.
